name: Spinnaker Redis issue.txt - Steps to clear the cache
description: This section provides step-by-step instructions to clear the cache of the Spinnaker Redis instance running on the prod-green-eks cluster. It involves creating a temporary Redis client pod, fetching the Redis password from a secure credential store, and executing the FLUSHALL command on the Redis instance to clear its cache. The instructions also mention how to handle cases where the Redis endpoint might have changed.
use_cases: Clearing the cache of a Redis instance used by Spinnaker
Troubleshooting or resetting the state of a Spinnaker deployment
Performing maintenance tasks on the Spinnaker Redis instance
Accessing and managing Redis instances running on a Kubernetes cluster
